PacketDefinitions.Description: This file contains common enum definitions which are used by server and client messages.

Enum.Name: ItemStorageKind
Enum.Description: Defines from or to which item storage an item is moved.

Enum.Name: LegacyQuestState
Enum.Description: The quest state for the legacy quest system.

EnumValue.Name: Undefined
EnumValue.Description: The state is undefined. This value is used when there is no quest defined for a specific index

EnumValue.Name: Active
EnumValue.Description: The quest is active and in progress.

EnumValue.Name: Inactive
EnumValue.Description: The quest is inactive, that means it isn't active and wasn't completed yet.
